name: Shopping Cart of Doom! (GMTK 2020)
description:
As you are unloading your cart, it begins rolling downhill. Hurry and catch it before you lose your groceries, or worse: be forced to reimburse property damages!

Controls:
Arrows or A/D to move character.
If the cart rolls long enough, it will begin to wobble. Afterward, it will move into another lane.

Click on the shopping cart to toss your wallet, cellphone, and keys, which can be used to influence the cart's trajectory. Be careful! You never quite know what it's going to do!
Hitting the cart while it is wobbling will cause it to either stabilize or move toward the opposite side of the hit.
Hitting the cart while it is stable will cause it to wobble.
Make sure to pick up your stuff afterward!
Don't sweat dodging the obstacles yourself, saving your groceries is too important to get hung up on stuff like personal injury.
Alt+F4 to quit.
